titleStmt.title: The sins of a gainsaying and rebellious people laid before them ... Also a word to foolish merchants ... / Written at the command of the Lord, by one of his servants called, John Rous.
titleStmt.author: Rous, John, d. 1695.
Fox, George, 1624-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the 4th. month 8th. day for M.W.,
